title: unesco_heritage_Archaeological_Site_of_Cyrene
text:
Name: Archaeological Site of Cyrene. short_description:

A colony of the Greeks of Thera, Cyrene was one of the principal cities in the Hellenic world. It was Romanized and remained a great capital until the earthquake of 365. A thousand years of history is written into its ruins, which have been famous since the 18th century.

. date_inscribed: 1982. danger: 1. date_end: . longitude: 21.85833. latitude: 32.825. area_hectares: 131.675. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Libya. Region: Arab States. iso_code: ly. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
